department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This RFI is published to determine if there are interested indigenous suppliers from across Canada for Communication and Advertising Services.
description: The Government of Canada is seeking potential suppliers for video production services.
full_summary:
=================
### Invitation to Supply Request for Information (RFI) and Video Production Services

#### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: WS3915568292
* Solicitation Title: Indigenous Firms RFI - MPACE_ADPORMM
* Publication Date: March 13, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 12, 2023 (14:00 hours)
* Contact Information:
  * Nina Caldwell, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  * Email: [nina.caldwell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nina.caldwell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  * Phone: N/A

#### Procurement Information

* The following Solicitation Reference is issued:
  * Tenders Solicitation Number: WS3915568292- Doc3915622673
  * Amendment: Zero (0)
* RFI Type: Request for Information - Indigenous Firms for video production services
* Category: Video Production Services
* UNSPSC Code: 82131603 (Video Production Services)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Trade Agreements: None
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Description

This Request for Information (RFI) is used to determine the availability and interest of Indigenous suppliers for video production services. Interested that can provide this service are encouraged to participate.

Please note that as this RFC is expired, interested agents are no longer able to bid, however, information may still be relevant as additional projects may open that are similar in nature.

This notice is being published in accordance with the Trade Agreement and all tenders are handled in accordance with the Trade Agreement. 

Please submit all inquiries to [nina.caldwell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nina.caldwell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). All inquiries need to be in writing.

### About this Solicitation
Solicitation Reference Number: WS3915568292- Doc3915622673  
The current Status of this solicitation is Expired. Solicitation Reference is for the following: "Indigenous  Service Firms RFI – MPSACE_ADPSROMM" and Tender Closing Date expired on May 12, 2023 at 14:00:00. All Interested firms were asked to shows the desire to and have an open tender bid. Each submission is expected to provide outlines of work and produce more business
